TopicTitle: KSP doesnt start, CPU usage 100 task manager freezes when i go into performance

Articles.Content:
The headline basically says it all, on Steam it says the game is running but it isn't

Any Idea what i should do?

https://imgur.com/a/yWhOUF2

I've had this before and i could only fix it by hard resetting my computer as it wouldnt even shut down

 

Edited July 5, 2018 by Gordn Ramsay

Those screen shots would help if it showed what was using 100% cpu. 

Try booting the game up outside of steam.  The Ksp.exe should be accessible to you.
